content.detailedDescription:
After seeing your show concerning the sightings of orbs this week on television, i finally decided to tell my story too. i have already told family, friends and neighbors of this experience mostly to get their reactions and to see if they had had similar. i also want to emphasize that this statement is every word the truth. i am telling it because i have never expected to see anything in my lifetime like it, i am now 67 years old, i still work as an fc bookkeeper and tax preparer. i am not looking to have my story on television nor am i looking for money. i just would like to let you know as investigators of these type of phenomenon about it. maybe my story is unusual or maybe not but to me it is because after watching your show i made the decision to tell you and my husband agreed with me:

i had taken my new puppy out to relieve herself around 3 a.M. we had only had her a short time and i was working on her potty training. as i was standing in our yard with her i noticed a bright glowing light a few feet to the east of me about 10-12' high and directly over our 4' fence. a lot of things were running through my mind because we live in a very wooded area and we have 12 acres of land and it is very dark in here at night. we also are isolated from neighbors so i was somewhat concerned as to what i was looking at and where and how did it  come from. as i was looking at it i decided to move and to my surprise it also moved the same way i did. then i bent down from my waist side ways, it did the same, then i bent from my waist sideways again on the opposite side, it did the same. so i thought it was somehow like being remotely controlled and i thought someone was playing a joke on me because i thought it was being playful and  what else would do that. i could think of nothing. i continued to do that a few more times.It always mimicked my movements. then all of a sudden it came over the fence and started coming toward me and then i became very concerned, i quickly grabbed my puppy and got into the house, locked the doors,ran up the stairs to our bedroom and tried to wake my husband. 

that is my story. i don't know what it was, or if i will ever see anything like it again. it had some sort of intelligence and seemed palyful or teasing at first. it made absolutely no noise at any time.

i hope that my experience with this phenomenon might be useful to you somehow in your work with the unknown. 

thank you for reading my statement and if you have any questions i would be happy to answer them.

sincerely,
marian kamin
content.summary: A glowing  bright basketball size orb round orb

content.detailedDescription: I took my daughters camping at jellystone campground, close to angola.Once my kids were in the tent asleep i noticed 3 slow moveing lights in the north sky. i have had interest in this subject since i was a child. i have always watched the sky. first learning how easily simple things like a  star can seem to be a ufo, until driving toward it for an hour or so . with some research i was chasing mars. but what i saw was not normal. this happened about 3 months ago. i actually found on google video, the exact same thing someone had recorded a couple years ago from the same approx. location. i have the video on my cell but the quality is horrible. i have a degree in electronics and feel i am amply educated. feel free to contact me and ill answer anything i can. and if need i will locate the video on google. i tried to contact the person who put the video up but couldnt get a responce. i wasnt going to say anything but i am atualy looking into becomeing a mufon investigator so...I should help any way i can in this pursute of truth. one thing i remember vividly is the way they seemed to float in straight random patterns, like they were bouncing of a wall of somesort. and sorry for the bad spelling...Next time i will use spell check. and also i just changed my phone number so if you contact me via email i will have a number for you.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 lights hovering in the north sky

content.detailedDescription: I am a small business owner and my wife is a minister. on the night of the 19th of april 2006 me and my wife were traveling north on the highway that goes through yuma proving grounds at about 9:45 at night when i noticed to the east directly above the proving grounds several lights flashing in a random pattern;i pulled over and we got out to get a better look, after a few seconds the lights changed the pattern that they were flashing on and off, the lights seem to be in a large rectangular pattern and i heard a faint popping sound each time the lights flashed, the lights were several hundred feet in the air and were not moving, the air felt electrified and the top of my head felt numb, we were only looking at them for maybe 10 minutes but when we got back into our vehicle nearly 45 minutes had passed also when we tried to film them nothing showed up. i can not explain what we saw but it was not a plane or helicopter and not some kind of lighted structure unless it was taller than a skyscraper, i have been through the proving grounds many times before and since and i have never seen anything like that except that 1 time.
content.summary: 7-8 flashes of light

content.detailedDescription:
My 13 year old son and his 2 friends were hanging out at one of the boys house (oct. 11, 2009) when they were talking about spirit orbs and catching them on camera.  so they went out on the back patio late afternoon, it was misty and cool that day.  he opened his cell phone to take randon pics to try and capture orbs.  he took 3 pics which 2 were blurry of the willow tree that is in the boys back yard.  the last one he took was of the grass, tree, a ball, and sky. 

the following evening he was going back through his pics and noticed the ufo in the clear pic he took.  he came down stairs and showed his dad then showed me.  my first reaction was that is a ufo, and i asked where he got the pic, he said he took it.  my husband fowarded the pic to his phone so he could zoom in on it.  it is very clear that it is a ufo.  i know that it is not a flying pig, witch, santa, bird, plane, or the all too famous "weather balloon".  i asked the boys did they see it or hear it.  they did not and were totally in "awe" over the whole thing. i want clarification on the pic from a ufo pro.  some people think we are crazy or that we photo shopped the pic.  i wish i owned that program and had the knowledge of how to edit pics, but i don't.  my kids tell me i am crazy and well maybe sometimes i am when they make me crazy.  lol.

my family has always believed in ufo's, so when we saw this pic we were like "wow", "see they do exist".  my family is not scared since the discovery of the pic, ufo's have been around for along time, and i think if they meant us harm they would have done so a long time ago.  you can't see who is piloting the craft so i can't for sure tell you if it is an alien or human.
content.summary: Teenage son caught a disc shape with his camera phone at a freinds house outside.  he did not see it with his naked eye, noticed the object the nect night.

content.detailedDescription: At the time i was a truck driver - had started driving at 12:00 a.M. after 10 hr. break.  first saw white orbs in sky - they would move rapidly across sky and then either go straight up or would - without turning - reverse direction - there were at least 3 doing this at a higher elevation - several hundreds of feet up in sky.  i then saw 3 flying side by side at a low elevation - as if they had taken off from a runway and were flying in a straight line - moving in a direction that would lead them to pass right in front of me.  as they got closer to the highway (i-10) for a brief second they were so low that my vision was blocked by an overpass.  as they passed on the other side of the overpass they for less than a second - turned into 3 small glowing jets - one pink - one blue and the other white.  as they topped the overpass they turned back into white orbs and suddenly swarmed each other - in the same ways that bees swarm around each other - they then made a sharp turn and shot up into the sky and dispersed.  another semi was coming from the opposite direction on i-10 and should have seen everything.  i called out on the radio "wow, did you see that?" and he asked "did i see what?" - i described what i had just seen and he basically asked what kind of drugs i was on, saying that what ever it was - he wanted some.  about 2 miles up the road i came across a car that was turned over on the side of the road and a state trooper was approaching on the opposite side of the highway.  he waited for me to pass the overturned vehicle and then crossed thru the median headed towards the vehicle.  thats it.  on the 3 jets - you could tell that they were not real - but they were glowing like glow sticks and you could actually see black outlines on the outside of the inner glow - more like an animation than a real jet.  i truly halfway expected to see the warner brothers symbol appear in the sky above them with porky the pig sticking his head through and saying "that, that thats all folks".  wasn't drinking - was not sleeping - had just finished my 10 hr. break.  drove a semi for 3 years and had never seen a ufo and drove many miles at night time in the middle of nowhere.
content.summary: Several white orbs - 3 that color and shape - then swamed in circles.

content.detailedDescription: Notice a light in the sky...Looked like a jet way out and then i noticed erratic jumping and side to side movement...Go my 135 mm lens and started taking pictures...They are pixelated somewhat but are clear enough to see the object.  i would estimate the object to be at 60,000 to 80,000 ft up.
content.summary: Looked like a jet ....Way out and then it started to jump side to side and up and down

content.detailedDescription:
while visiting daughter in north carolina we were sitting outside having a b-b-q around 7pm. i had been looking up at how clear the 1/2 moon looked when i noticed an object come around from the backside of the moon, from the dark side and head earthward when it got around front.
  the object was bright, like a star, and not much bigger as i could see it. it traveled from left to right circling the moon and heading downward when it came around the front.
if you were to animate the whole scene it would look like an object was sent from the back of the moon around the front and downward towards the earth. my exact word when i saw it was "nice!"
content.summary: It came around from the back of the moon

content.detailedDescription:
First, i must say that i discovered this unknown object in the attached picture only recently after doing some file organization on my computer.  i did not initially notice anything unusual about this pic when it was first taken. nothing that happened while taking the picture was out of the ordinary.  the entire amount of time it took to set up and take this pic was less than two minutes.  i just took the shot and downloaded it to my computer to free up space on my 32m picture card.

i like to take pictures of sunsets from my back fence.  this picture shows the sun setting on the horizon during an early evening monsoon back in july of this year.  the compass heading of the shot is approx 300 deg.  the storm cell was moving in the direction of my house and is backlit in the areas where it was closest to the ground. it shows up orange against the dark storm-cloud above.  it had just begun to sprinkle rain as can be seen by the drops which are illuminated by the camera flash.  (normally, there is no need to use flash for a sunset pic, the camera flash was set to auto at the time.) several raindrops can be seen falling in a downward direction and are blurry indicating movement.  the rest of the scene is in clear view because i use a tripod mounted on a solid brick fence post.  i usually judge focus in my pictures using the electrical wires between the towers that can be seen on either side of the sun (1/3 mile away).  zoom in to see the wires.  all of the distant light sources are not blurred in any way.  these light sources are at a local airport, the control tower (2 miles away) can be seen just to the right of the sun and left of the electrical tower.

the thing that is unknown to me is the object to the left of the sun.  when i took the picture, i don't remember seeing anything unusual, i was just taking a sunset picture.  the object appears to be between me and the electrical wires. the object appears to be moving towards the camera and in a slightly upward direction.  i also see three other bright objects (2 lower middle, 1 lower right of the view) above the ground on either side of a known dead pixel in my camera's ccd.  they are not falling or showing much movement at all.  not sure what those are.  all of the other light sources in this pic are familiar to me.

if you have the capability to analyze this picture, can you tell me what it is?  i don't know.  maybe it is just an optical effect of some sort due to the camera flash?  could it be ball lightning?  i don't remember hearing any associated thunder after i took the picture.  in fact, there was no lightning at all generated by this particular storm cell.

i used the camera's software to show the picture info for this shot in the attached files.  let me know if you have any other questions,
matt
content.summary: Unknown orb appears in sunset photo

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with my wife down baltimore city's jones falls expressway leading south toward downtown into the city when i spotted this enormous ship in the sky over downtown. thinking it might possibly be a blimp the overall aspect of which i was somehow misreading, i studied it hard until i could rule out, to my own satisfaction, any chance of it being a conventional craft. more than anything, it resembled a featureless aircraft carrier in the sky -- one with a superstructure and angularity that brought the word "alien" to mind, moreover, it had a "there -- not there" quality i find difficult to describe. i asked my wife to verify my impression, but found her to be antagonistic about doing so -- as if inexplicably angry at the thing and the entire episode. nevertheless -- she allowed that it was bizarre and inexplicable. sometime after this, i emailed bill bean, a local ufo watcher and learned that he had witnessed it as well.
content.summary: Blimp-like with a queer "alien" angularity, enormous, battleship gray

content.detailedDescription:
"narrative below was submitted by mufon dispatch for witness based on phone conversation with witness."

back in 1976, a friend took me to a place that "orbs" were being seen. we drove to the area and i sat on the hood of the car. we sat real still. we saw about four of them, but one came up a few inches from my face. it was a big as a basketball and the color red. my friend honked his car horn and the object "winked out." they changed colors. i can show someone where the exact location was.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Had close encounter with red orb the size of a basketball.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i rented a beach house on st. george island, fl from june 28 - july 5, 2009. our sightings started on either the night of june 28 or 29.  (someone else in my family might remember which night it started.)  we were all sitting on the screened porch with the lights off, overlooking the gulf and enjoying the sounds of the ocean and each other's company. it was about 10pm. we were all just talking and my mom and i happened to be looking at the same direction of the night sky when, out of nowhere, a group of about 3 or so orange lights just appeared.  they were about 70 degrees up from the horizon.  it was like they all came on together as a group, since they were all near each other, but didn't all come on exactly at the same time.  it was either that or, maybe it could have only been 2 total lights, its just they were moving around and going on and off?  the orange lights is just what they were--just orange dots of light appearing in the sky. there was no sound at all. the dots did not move around themselves, they just flashed on and off, like a flashlight. the first thing that popped out of my mouth was "...Was that...A plane?"  which is funny i said that since it most certainly did not look like a plane!  my mom, the biggest skeptic ever, agreed that it definitely did not look like a plane, or anything we had ever seen before or heard of before.  my dad is retired military and he said they definitely weren't flares, since flares don't just come on brightly as an orange dot and flash on and flash off.  they would flash on for maybe 3 secs then flash off.  the same thing happened again and again that night and other nights during that week we stayed there.  the groups of orange lights did not always come on in the same spot, it was always a different spot in the sky where a group would appear.  we all watched for them every night the rest of the week.  we saw them mostly the first few nights of the week, and after that didn't really see them much anymore, sadly...  it was so cool and i am totally interested in ufo's and am so happy to have seen some!
content.summary: Orange lights appearing in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: I am reporting this due to gabe spencers report.  in 1984 i was living on the ranch we own in mc mullen county. i was outside on the deck of our home when i looked up and saw an orange orb. it was very large and self illuminating.  it resembled the moon but smaller and closer. i froze. i did not feel any malintent from it. it remained stationary in the sky and made no sound. my parents were in the house and i wanted to let them know, but could not take my eyes off of it to go inside and tell them. i watched it for what seemed like and eternity, but appoximately 5 min and it just vanished. i have checked with mufon over the years to see if anyone has reported something simular, but something told me to check in early august. after reading mr. spencers report i believe we saw the same thing, 25yrs apart. i have also found another report on mufon that is simular. it is also around the same time as my sighting. mufon may contact me, but i wish to remain anonymous.
content.summary: Orange moon-like orb

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Conditions were scatter high thin clouds. vissibility good. went outside my house at aproxiamateley 7:50 to have a cigarette. was facing sw looking at the moon 3/4 full, venus, and the stars when i saw a bright light bluish white in color high in the sky come over the roof of my house moving fast in a se heading. it was as bright as venus, as i could see venus to my right, but not as high in the sky maybe 30 thousand ft or more. at first i thought it was a passenger jet with landing light turned on for some unknown reason, but it was moving to fast and then it did a quick zig zag to the left and then back right then continued heading se. i kept watching it thinking maybe my eyes were playing tricks on me for about a minute or so as it was heading toward a small high thin cloud. it started going behind the cloud and i could still see it through the cloud due to the brightness of the object. at about half way through the cloud it disappeared. i kept watching since i could see all sides of the cloud waiting for it to appear on the side or even heading in another direction, but it never did.
 i kept watching for about 5 more minutes and scanning the sky where it should of been, when a bright shooting star or fireball appeared out of nowhere real low in the sky heading in the oppsite direction nw. the hieght of the fireball i estimate  to be about 100 hundred to a thousand ft above the tree line. i estimate the distance away from me to be about a 1-3 miles as there is a mountian range 5-10 miles away from my house wich you could see that night and the fireball was in front of the range.  the fireball also had a real low angle of entry almost flat with a tail behind it. it lasted about 5 seconds and i could see splinters come off it as it was burning up. i waited about five more minutes but saw nothing else and went inside to tell my wife.  
i don't believe the first object was an asteroid as it was going to slow, and not a jet or satelitte as it was going to fast and did that quick zig zag manuver. i also know the most of the traffic patterns in the area above my house fairly good and it wasn't on a flight course i recognize. i star gaze all the time and can tell the differance between jets, planes, and helicopters as i live only a mile away from a small community air port. the object was also way to high for a plane landing there. what strikes me as odd is seeing the object and then the shooting star so close in time together with the appearing so low out of nowhere and  going in the opposite direction with parts splintering off. i can't say it isn't possible, but find it highly improbable.
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription:
I am 53 years old and live in westchester county, ny, and have seen ufo���s four times, that i know of.  i���ve always lived in the hudson valley.  the first sighting was when i was a teenager.  my sister and i and a night watchman at bard college witnessed a disc with multi colored lights above the hudson river.  the speed and directional angles it traveled convinced us it was not of this world, and we were astounded when it finally shot off into space at an amazing rate. a few years later, again on the hudson river, i was going over the kingston rhinecliff bridge with two friends at about three in the morning to get breakfast after closing the bar we worked at (none of us had been drinking, i swear) and there, hovering above the river, was a gray saucer emitting a beam of light into the river.  i remember we stopped the car to watch in amazement.  however, to this day, none of us can recall leaving the bridge, or eating breakfast, or returning home, yet, somehow, we all got home safely.

i grew up in a very old house at bard college that was on the edge of a field with woods surrounding us.  i have childhood memories of very bright lights shining in my windows, and of having out of body experiences, where i was floating at ceiling level watching my body in my bed.  i once woke up in my room in the wrong bed, above the covers, facing the wrong way, with a bloody nose, and no recollection of how i got there.  i never ever considered ufo abduction.

years later, on the island of kauai overlooking hanalei bay, i woke my husband and announced that i was pregnant and in nine months we���d have a son.  i had a vivid dream before he was born (i was right!) of standing on a balcony at hanalei bay with my son in my arms, watching a ufo come towards me.  i knew they wanted my son.  when he was four, he started telling me about his friends from the sky, whom he named ditty, pom pom, ten ten and king king.  he told me i knew who they were and, periodically throughout his childhood, he���d tell me, ���they���re coming���.  when he was about 12, he told me he and his little cousins had seen a ufo come across the lake towards them at our house in the adirondacks.  when he was 16, he woke one morning and had two perfectly cylindrical marks on his calf that looked like they had been made by a machine.

a year ago i was in my bedroom sleeping when my husband woke me up because there was a blood red orb in our room, and it was freaking him out.  it was about the size of a beach ball, hovering at ceiling level.  it looked gelatinous and fluid, lit from within, and it pulsated.  all the shades were drawn in the room, so it wasn���t a reflection of anything external.  now, normally, i would have been very excited, i would have been grabbing a camera and would have tried to figure out what the hell it was, but all i wanted to do was get back in my bed and go to sleep.  this, too, is strange, because i am normally a night owl, and i never would have been asleep that early.  it felt like i had been drugged.  my husband said he had to leave, that he was going downstairs to sleep (thanks, faithful husband), and he left. i got back into bed, and the orb traveled across the room, still at ceiling level, and came to stop directly over my head, still at ceiling level.  i remember watching it above me, but that is all i remember of that night. 

two days later, my head started hurting really badly.  it felt like it was filled with mucous, and for a month and a half, i was in constant pain.  numerous trips to two different doctors, along with two series of steroids, and three series of antibiotics, failed to give me relief.  an mri of my head showed it was full of something, actually packed with something, but the doctors were at a loss to explain what it was or why it wasn���t going away.  now comes the really gross part of the story.  one morning on the toilet, a fairly large, gelatinous blob of something came out of me into the toilet.  i thought about taking a sample of it for analysis, but then i thought, ���how am i to explain this?  where in the hell would i bring this for analysis?  people will think i���m insane!���  the one upshot, though, was my head was miraculously clear, finally.

then my health really went kablooey.  my blood pressure skyrocketed, as did my cholesterol, and different joints started becoming inflamed at different times.  when it was in my knees, i couldn���t walk, when it was in my hands, i couldn���t even dress myself.  at different times, every joint of my body has been affected.  my rheumatoid factor has shot up to five times a normal person���s level, and the doctors keep finding blood in my urine with no explanation as to why. i was finally given a diagnosis of rheumatoid arthritis, and i am battling it still, but i am more and more convinced that something entered me that night and is systematically going through my body, which is causing my autoimmune system to go haywire.

prior to all this, i have to say i���d enjoyed good health.  i come from a family that believes you only go to a doctor if you���re really, really ill.  i am no hypochondriac, far from it.  also, it might be prudent to add that i have always been very psychic.  as a child, i always knew if one of my siblings was in trouble.  as an adult, i have even known when my adult son or daughter is throwing up, because even if i���m miles away, i literally feel what they���re experiencing.  i have predicted two car accidents, because i saw them happening about a week before they occurred as i was drifting off to sleep.  i don���t always know who is going to be involved, but i now know to warn friends and family when i have one of these precognitive episodes.
content.summary: Orb experience

content.detailedDescription: I have just had an ufo encounter not 20 minutes ago.  the craft is large and i believe it has landed in the wooded area of my property.  i believe it is still there.  i was trying to fall asleep after watching a television show and i was receiving strong psychic messages.  i had the strong tendency to turn and saw a huge ufo on the horizon from my viewpoint.  this is just amazing.  something else is out there and it is not an airplane.  this craft is silent.  it covered the sky and made a sharp turn in under 1 minute.  i am baffled by what this is.  this is traveling incredibly fast.  it has bright solid white lights and a flashing red one.  this is unbelievable.  wow!  this is the 5th ufo i have seen this month.  i thought swiftly and grabbed a camera.  i have a video i will attach.
content.summary: Bright lighted ufo.  orb like in nature.  i can't tell the exact shape though!

content.detailedDescription:
After researching dulce base , went out for luch and at 1:04 a plane (very low altitude around 3-600 ft) passed over head leaving huge chemtrail , then another at 1:11 and many more over a period of 3 hours . the sky gradually filled with clouds , various random unusual cloud formations appeared and then i noticed the ufo shaped one and like this is perfect shape not like a cloud .  i took many pitures 7 megapixel i think and sum video of all the clouds . and i realised sumthing there is a mine here that was shut down right (dont know why) ... and its now filled with water , and there is this big thing about pumping it all out . they say the town will collapse if the water is pumped out (lies i think ). now i swear i have seen a pic of it empty with a military tank in it (going to find it ).Right? and strangely our town has a very high suicide rate ,i was told highest in the southern hemisphere (mind control ?). im thinking there may be sumthing here .Because the water that fills this open cut mine if copper sulfate or sumthing and the copper out of it would be worth millions of dollars (yet the owners dont care ) and it is fenced off .I have seen something (a ghost trying to get to me) there at night inside the fence (note i was very drunk ) so i dont know but it scared me to death .Im going to research this further . but i think it isnt coincidence that the first chemtrails i have ever seen here start when i begin really researching secret gov. stuff .I will continue to research this regardless of "effects" and conciquences .
1. i was driving around and then at home when i spotted the ufo cloud.
2. its strange shape and i was taking photos of chemtrails. 
3. it was a perfect ufo shape , so i thought a possible ufo.
4. stationary sadly i didnt observe it for long , so unsure.
5. in my head my reaction was holy [cms/tg/pd] i think and i felt an omg feeling during and after.
6. i kept taking pictures and i dont know what happend to it clouds were forming in mass maybe haarp , but idk . i will review the tapes i have .
content.summary: Chemtrails (never happend before) then ufo shaped cloud hi res photo taken

content.detailedDescription: There was a ball of green light moving from side to side up and down etc. after the ball of went behind a-mountain two helicopters seemed to chase after it. i reported it before but did not feel good talking about to you guys over the phone. i just the episode of ufo hunters and saw that i have not been the only one that has seen these balls of light over the past few months. please contact me at the e-mail i provided.
content.summary: Ball of green light over tucson

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my back porch that faces south,screened in,porch light on, no other lights on.Two other people with me,having a cigarette,we all watched it fly over heading towards orlando international airport and we noticed it's odd design,lights,reflectiveness,and thought that it was an odd plane then we realised there was no sound and right at that time it turned and headed east.It didn't bank it turned.Good distance away at that point from my house, a little shy of where airplanes disappear over the horizon on way to airport.I don't know how high it was, not very, cause we could see the surface the lights were reflecting off.It had multicolored lights,in an odd pattern we all came up with nine lights on the object,u- shaped is how we described it.After it turned it had more of a triangle shape but extended,like the nose was very long in the front.(just lights at that point)very big to be able to see it that clearly,very flashy strobes on it as well,different than regular strobes on aircraft,very different.We were very excited to see a ufo,i knew we had to write it down as soon as we saw it while it was fresh in our minds.Sorry it took so long to report it.
content.summary: Flew overhead without a sound,lit up,big,odd,quick,solid,reflective,very shiny,turned abruptly

content.detailedDescription:
Have seen this several times over the past 5 years in two differant areas of the sky on most occasions had been one orb that flashes light can be sitting still pretty low in the sky then will shoot up very fast and back to the position first observed,will start to shoot away then shoot back total oppisite direction and suddenly just dissapear!My oldest and middle daughter have seen this with me on several occasions as well. i have always been afraid to say anything to anyone ever!This most recent time i wanted proof even just for myself so i grabbed the only video devise i own and that is my cell phone i took 3 cell phone videos one after another after i had been watching it for about 8 or 9 minutes,i ussualy freeze and am stunned to the point its only after it has disappeard that i think"wow i should have tryed to take a pic.Of that or a video" this time i got my cell video! its not perfect but you can see that it is round fairly small stationary then moves very fast then just disappears! i was never going to report this to anyone not even my husband,until i was watching tv and saw a peice on all of the missouri sightings of the same exact thing!!!! and a video a guy had taken in missouri that looked and acted exactly like what i have seen and videoed! i am not doing this for publicity at all! but when they were talking about the investigations around here i thought my date, time, and video, may help or match up with someone elses account on the same date and time. my daughters and i all 4 feel very scared almost frozen when we have watched this!!!! almost a feeling of could they know that i am looking at it (them)??? and was scared to even take the video!When i showed my daughters the video back they said "mom you sound terrified" i said "i was very scared" if this can help with anything or anyone would like our account of what we have seen i would be willing to talk to someone.      thanks
i dont have the capability to send my cell video to the computer but could and would be able to send it to another cell phone number i tried that by sending it to my daughters phone wich i had her delete after we made sure they would send! there is audio on my video as well,another point i will make is that even as close as we have seen this it has always been silent!!!!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multiple sightings!Cell video for this one.Stays n 1 spot then shoots aross n back up n down

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my window, just looking at the night time lights and stars which i do frequently when i noticed a very bright light directly above my line of sight. it looked like a street light size light compared to the stars around it. after seeing it with my peripheral vision i looked right at it and for aprox 30 secs i watched it just sit there. every once in a while it would flicker a little but not much, the shape and size stayed true the whole time as well. after the 30 secs it began to what seemed like just fade out or fly strait away from my vantage point, it just kept getting smaller, dimmer until it was gone. what made me watch it was in the direction of the orb we can see life flight helicopters take off and fly and when i first saw the light thats what i thought it was. however, when it is the copter the light tends to bounce and move, even change intensity, this did not, it was bright white and huge compared to the size of the stars. this is not the first time either, over the past month or so i've seen it 4 or 5 times, covering an area of about 45 degrees in sight line but always in the same area. there was also no noise with the sightings and always the same outcome, just fades away or flies away getting smaller and dimmer. i've lived here my whole life and i am what my wife calls a star gazer because i love to look at them and i have seen some crazy things in the sky but this is the first time i felt i needed to tell someone. and after seeing a special on the history channel about orbs on ufo hunters i decided to contact you because that was exactly what i saw. while observing it i felt calm but yet fearful of what i was seeing, sort of like, is that really what i think it is. i hope i am not alone because i don't want to seem crazy so would you please let me know if there are any other people seeing these, i am not making this up and am now trying to get them on film
content.summary: A bright orb-likeobject

content.detailedDescription:
We go to a place and we can see objects flying in all different directions at high rates of speed, and at ultra high altitude, at any time of the year.

these objects disappear, re-appear, and flash.  my wife and daughter saw an oval shaped object flying over the navy base without making any noise, the day after 9/11.

we wer at the beach sitting in loungers looking up some objects were space debri obviously but some were not
  we were excited to cee thede things and went back many times to see them
content.summary: We see ufos any time we want we just go to a location where we see them and they are there all shapes and sizes

content.detailedDescription: I'd been praying alone, in my mind, for about a half-hour after someone had left my house. i got to the point of asking god to let me know how i should live me life, as it had now become evident a significant relationship had changed. at the exact moment i completed that request in my mind, sitting on my couch looking out the window at the same time, i saw a point of light rise up from behind a tree and grow lengthwise in size then stop and become a horizontal white line of shimmering light in the sky. i often see airplanes coming into the airport turning around in that part of the sky, but this light was much wider than the airplane headlights i see. i could only figure it was a large airplane, so i kept looking at it, expecting it to bank out of its turn i figured it was in - i wanted to see what this craft was, it was relatively big! the white line didn't move, but grew in size a bit, 10 to 20 percent. i then looked at the clock to note the time of 8:55 pm. it stayed in that position for about 30 seconds. it then started to move very slowly to the left, its right side seeming to tilt up at a faster rate than it was moving left, but through the area of movement it remained light, "sparkling" away as it tilted to about a 60 degree angle, the light dissapating until two clearly spherical white balls of light remained. i could see the sky between the balls of light, and the overall intensity was dimmer than the white line it was before. the craft(s) was still slowly moving left, but had only moved about it's "line" length in the time it took the "line" to tilt and look like two distinct balls. the two balls then sped off left behind a tree, seemingly without accelerating, they just started moving at the speed they sped off at from the very slow speed they were when a line. the balls reminded equidistant from each other, and were so straight it was like they were on rails. i ran outside to see if they would emerge from the other side, but i didn't see them. i went back in and got my camera to take a picture of my viewpoint from inside looking out at the sky conditions. i did that, and was sitting there looking out the window when i heard a light wind blow then saw what seemed to be a very low flying commercial airliner fly right over my house! it was about 85 degrees in temperature that evening with humidity about the same percentage. the air was very still, which is rare for where i live in the city, which is why i noticed the wind start to blow. i had my camera! i went outside on my front porch and put it on my porch railing to get a picture of the very silent craft now completing a banking maneuver, still close enough that i could fit the craft within my hand width. everything worked until i hit the shutter and it failed! at that point the camera would do nothing, including off or on!! of course i'm frustrated, and the craft is now getting off in the distance. suddenly, the camera just comes back on in my hands, so i reset on the porch railing and took two shots although it was now much further away. i actually captured it, although perhaps indistinct from a plane to most people. it wasn't faa legal by its light, no red and green lights on wingtips, and the blinking was wrong, and not always blinking but steady. it was a triangle of lights, red in the lead, although closer to what would seem to be its midsection, and white on the "wingtips." in terms of describing it in ufo patterns, it was a triangle with the front light out. the white lights always blinked after it passed my house, steady when it went over, and the red light usually didn't blink, but did sometimes. the attached triangle picture is actual, the spheres picture is a "hybrid," created using the real picture i took of the sky a few minutes after i'd seen the white line and balls, which i "painted" in with microsoft paint. the hybrid image yet looks very close to real as i saw them. i found it ironically interesting that the location in the sky where i eventually actually captured the triangle is exactly where the white line hovered!!
content.summary: Bright white line in sky tilts and changes to two balls, triangle flies over house.

content.detailedDescription: It was mid evening on a cool night , and i had gone to look at stars with a small telescope it was dark out already and cool and you could see the stars i placed the telescope on the hood of one of our car in my driveway. while i was looking through the scope i saw a light through the viewing lense i came out from behind the telescope and looked up at the tree top and house top level there was a disc with circular lights around the bottom of the craft in a circular pattern of red yellow red yellow all the way around the bottom of the craft near the edge.It was hovering right over me i had never seen anything like it, it was extremmly close to me and and i could tell it was not a plane, blimb, or helicopter,during this i felt more fear than i ever have in my entire life. i stared for i don't how long i beleive a couple of seconds and the ran into the house and where my dad was in the room that had a large window facing the direction of the craft an screamed for him to look out the window to see the craft by that time it was gone the incedent had to have lasted less that five minutes but more than one
content.summary: Looking at stars, ufo appeared above tree, ufo size of a house.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving south on routes 10/202 looked to the east and saw a large triangle shaped object with bright white stobes low in the sky moving slowly over the  hill tops. i noticed it out of the corner of my eye due to the brightness of the strobes and, after that, its size. i stopped the car and turned around to try to get a better look but it had moved enough that i could not see it very well but, i could still see it. i could see that it was a solid object with strobes and it could have not been a plane due to its size, altitude and the fact that i could see it as a solid object shaped nothing like a plane. my 10 year old daughter was in the back seat and asked me "what the heck is that?! i calmly replied i guess a plane, not wanting to upset her. after the incident was over i asked her what it looked like to her she said "if i didn't know they weren't real i'd say a ufo." i said "oh i know, i'm sure it was a plane but what did it look like?" she said "a triangle".

this is a fairly populated area, there must have been other sightings.
content.summary: Triangle like with bright white strobes.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a rural road just out of sikeston, missouri and noted 4 bright lights first in kind of a chevron, then making a square. they moved a little east, then back. a larger round whihte light seemed to rise up and meet them and moved to the middle of the formation, like the 5 sponts on a die, then they moved east slowly. less than a minute later they came back and the 4 circled the 1 mid light and they moved to the north at a slow speed.

a few days before this i had noticed 12 military helicopters at the local air port, at least 4 of which were large dual propped vessels. one had a long item like a lance going to a tapered point running it's entire right side approximately 35 feet in length. we rarely have that many of any aircraft here .. 4 helicopters a week would be unusual. the night of the sighting these copters were heard from the south of me, and i saw two of the bigger helicopters clearly, and could hear the prop sound identifying them. the sighted craft mad no sound, and one in the middle did go from white to green, back to constant white.

this was near rainbow alake road in sikeston, just east of interstate 55 and a little north of interstate 57.
content.summary: Round lights appearing as in formation, met by a 5th light. flew a pattern several times.

content.detailedDescription: A loud explosion was heard outside my house that shook my house and me, and neighbors houses as well. the neighbors came out and i could hear them chatting, the windows were open. at the time of the "explosion," i was praying with joan. in a strange irony, exactly as i prayed out loud that god protect joan, with our eyes closed we both heard and felt a very loud "explosion" that seemed close by, shaking us and the house. we had already been praying, so we shortly finished and i went out front, but those neighbors we'd heard come out and talking had gone back in. as reported to mufon, thirteen days earlier on september 17th joan witnessed an unconventional craft fly over her on her way to my house. anyway, i then went back in and out my back door, and two neighbors were still talking outside. my next door neighbor, and her husband, by her own initiative and repeated testimony with questions, stated she and her husband saw a "huge" white light over the cross-street at the same time of the explosion. both neighbors, the other two houses down, had their houses shake too. my next door neighbor, whose house was to my back as i was sitting on my couch with joan, were sitting on their couch facing in the opposite direction in their house than i was in mine. we both only have windows on the north side of our houses which look out to the street we live on, they are the last house on our street. looking out their window, where our street ends in a "t" with a main city street, morganford, she and her husband saw a "huge" white light over the street at that location at the time of the explosive bang, that only lasted for the duration of the sound. i asked her if she didn't just see a flash of light, or a light over the cemetery sky bordering that main street, but she emphatically said "no" to those things, and described seeing a "huge flash of white light over the street" at the time of the explosive bang that shook our homes, like a white "ball" of light she said!
content.summary: Explosion shakes houses and neighbor sees white light ball over street.

content.detailedDescription: My friend joan had left a friend of hers to drive to my house, about a 2 mile drive straight down a main city street, morganford. almost immediately she noticed a very bright white light in the distance in the air, traveling towards her, right over the street she was on. as it got closer she could see the light was a rectangular "viewing window" on the front of the craft. stopped at a light, sticking her head out the window, she looked straight up as it passed directly over her head. the fuselage was tube shaped, not tapered at the front and back as most planes are. the wings were delta shaped, with a single red light underneath each wing, not at the tips. also, there were two additional "windows" underneath the craft, each where the wings met the fuselage at the front and back. the craft moved slowly, but as fast as a slow moving plane would. she didn't notice any sound. from her description, i created an image of the overhead sighting, which she says looks just like what she saw.
content.summary: Strange air craft flying down st. louis city street at night.

content.detailedDescription:
Videoing classified equipment for a major defense company, assignment to video incoming aircraft for the test at the top of a moutain -  observed a bright disk just off course of the aircraft and thought it was an aircraft until it got close enought to recognize. 
i have the video on a dvd of the aircraft and the disc incoming for review.
i want to remain annomous due to my work with the defense company.


this was a classified range and no other aircraft were cleared to be in the area during this test. 
you can contact me for copy of the dvd if you want to view it.
content.summary: Video in mid day slightly overcast - bright disc shape 400kmh.
content.locationName: White Sands Missile Range, New Mexico

content.detailedDescription:
Object observed was triangular in shape comprised of three intensely luminated spheres which stay in position for several hours unaffected by earth's rotation or wind related movements visible from the playing field of our local high school. i phoned in my verbal description to mr. robert d. long, assistant state director, mufon, ny who advised me to fill out this report on the main site. we originally sent report to ny mufon, site did not work on several attempts.

these lights were first observed by me around october 21, 2009 at approximately 6:55 p.M. i observed these lights (riding in my car) out of the corner of my eye because of their brightness and as i continued to watch noticed they were not in motion in any way. at first lights did not seem suspicious, however, as i continued on my way could not help (in other directions) see these bright lights as they stayed fixed. traffic took me away from continuing to observe these lights.

it was not until tonight, october 26th at around 9:45 p.M., that the incident became more significant. my daughter called me on her cell that she wanted me to see some lights she observed, stating that she had seen them in the same week prior (as did my wife), and i should be outside waiting to be picked up to view. as we drove to the sighting area, she explained what she observed two hours previously. it was at that time i recalled my sighting of the same objects, and when we arrived there they were in the exact spot i saw them on the 21st. again, there was no motion, just intense, bright orbs, forming a triangle which reminded me of the phoenix lights. all of a sudden one orb moved in a semi-circular motion (clockwise and upward) to the side of the upper most orb. that was the only motion observed at any time. later, they were in the same formation as first observed. note, on the 25th, around 5:30 p.M. there was unusual helicopter traffic, whether more than one was difficult to ascertain, nor were they visible to my eyes though very loud. they circled for about 15-20 minutes continuously. connected? not known. i mentioned that to my daughter.

we continued to drive in an attempt to find a clearer vantage point without tree lines or buildings which obstructed out view. as we drove they stayed fixed. they dimmed for a brief moment, several seconds, then became brighter once more. we realized we had no chance of moving to a clear area. my daughter then suggested we return to the original viewing spot. on the way back they were still visible until we arrived at the original spot and were shocked to see they were gone!  tonight the weather was overcast, very little visibility and the planet jupiter was next to the moon (dimly visible), just enough to make out each body. these bright objects had to be below that cloud cover to shine so intensely.

my daughter attempted to take a phone photo. only two objects were dimly visible. tomorrow, if these objects follow the previous pattern and time frame, we will have a better camera to take photos. i will attempt to see if these objects will show at dusk and later. if so will record times, areas, and motion(s) (if any).

i repeat, they remained motionless, unaffected by even the earth's motion. they were not aircraft nor were they flares or reflections from ground objects. these lights had not been seen by either of us at any time prior to these sightings. i would like to know if others in my area had reported what we observed, officially or unofficially. thank you for taking the time to view my report. hopefully we can get these lights on camera.

i delayed my entry to observe another night. weather was heavy rains, no visibility. tonight the 29, the lights are visible and in a different formation though triangular. one object dimmed, this is the 2nd time, and the formation changed. that same light appeared in a different spot (lower,fixed). i could not get a clear photo.

i would like to know if other reports in my area have been recorded. thank you for taking time to read my notes.

sincerely, art moyano
content.summary: Triangular shaped ufu comprised of three illuminated speres in a fixed postion  with a time length of several hours

content.detailedDescription: My grandfather, cousin and i were laying on the hood of our car stargazing one night. out of no where a strange dark obect flew from the horizon at breakneck speed then stopped with in a blink of an eye  directly over us(the g force from a stop like that would of ripped any human craft in half.) t seemed to be a ways up. it had 3 lights similar to the lights on our airplanes except they didnt flash.However weird this may sound the sky behind the craft as it flew became ominously dark (even the stars were blacked out.) then it flew impossible fast from a complete stop and flew into the horizon and the blackened sky returned to its normal state after it was gone. i felt as if someone was watching us and i saw something i shouldnt have. i had a strange yet calming feeling the rest of the night.
content.summary: Dark triangular object in sky with lights
